com.samskivert.depot

Class Exps

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.samskivert.depot.Exps

  • public class Exps
extends Object
    Provides static methods for expression construction. For example: literal(java.lang.String), value(T) and years(int).

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Exps() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static SQLExpression<Integer> days(int amount)
      Creates an interval for the specified number of days.
      static SQLExpression<Integer> hours(int amount)
      Creates an interval for the specified number of hours.
      static <T> SQLExpression<T> literal(String text)
      Creates a literal expression with the supplied SQL snippet.
      static SQLExpression<Integer> minutes(int amount)
      Creates an interval for the specified number of minutes.
      static SQLExpression<Integer> months(int amount)
      Creates an interval for the specified number of months.
      static SQLExpression<Integer> seconds(int amount)
      Creates an interval for the specified number of seconds.
      static <T> FluentExp<T> value(T value)
      Wraps the supplied object in a value expression.
      static SQLExpression<Integer> years(int amount)
      Creates an interval for the specified number of years.

      • literal

        public static <T> SQLExpression<T> literal(String text)
        Creates a literal expression with the supplied SQL snippet. Note: you're probably breaking cross platform compatibility by using this construction.
